QuestData.Title: The Sea of Souls
QuestData.Description:
Some force here seeks to keep us from finding Tyrande.
The trail of bodies seems to go into this... stream of souls.
I suggest we split up. I will follow along the bank of the river. You enter its current and follow the trail.
Should you need me, I will be close at hand.
We will find Tyrande, no matter where this course leads.
QuestData.LogDescription: Follow the trail of corpses to Tyrande Whisperwind.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Shandris Feathermoon in Ve'nari's Refuge.
QuestData.RewardText: Tyrande must see reason. She cannot save the kaldorei if she remains lost within this darkness.
